scripts.build-docker: npm run build-all && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64,linux/arm/v7 -t louislam/cecilefy-uptime:push . --push --target release
scripts.build-all: npm run build-win && npm run build-linux-amd64 && npm run build-linux-arm64 && npm run build-linux-armv7 && npm run build-linux-armv6 && npm run build-linux-armv5 && npm run build-linux-riscv64
scripts.build-win: cross-env GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 go build -x -o ./build/cecilefy-uptime-push.exe cecilefy-uptime-push.go
scripts.build-linux-amd64: cross-env GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -x -o ./build/cecilefy-uptime-push-amd64 cecilefy-uptime-push.go
scripts.build-linux-arm64: cross-env GOOS=linux GOARCH=arm64 go build -x -o ./build/cecilefy-uptime-push-arm64 cecilefy-uptime-push.go
scripts.build-linux-armv7: cross-env GOOS=linux GOARCH=arm GOARM=7 go build -x -o ./build/cecilefy-uptime-push-armv7 cecilefy-uptime-push.go
scripts.build-linux-armv6: cross-env GOOS=linux GOARCH=arm GOARM=6 go build -x -o ./build/cecilefy-uptime-push-armv6 cecilefy-uptime-push.go
scripts.build-linux-armv5: cross-env GOOS=linux GOARCH=arm GOARM=5 go build -x -o ./build/cecilefy-uptime-push-armv5 cecilefy-uptime-push.go
scripts.build-linux-riscv64: cross-env GOOS=linux GOARCH=riscv64 go build -x -o ./build/cecilefy-uptime-push-riscv64 cecilefy-uptime-push.go
